title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1633.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1633.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part: (a) controlled substance shall have the same
meaning given such term in section
3306
of the

Public Health Law; and
(b) drug-related crime shall mean the illegal manufacture, sale, distribution, use, or possession with intent to manufacture, sell, distribute, or use, a
controlled substance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1633.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
